LPVDataset.label: Choose an existing Lightning Page View dataset.
LPVDataset.description: This should be the original LightningPageView event log file, provided by the Event Monitoring templated app, or one created from an external connector. Please do not select a dataset that already has User details augmented.

LIDataset.label: Choose an existing Lightning Interaction dataset.
LIDataset.description: This should be the original LightningInteraction event log file, provided by the Event Monitoring templated app, or one created from an external connector. Please do not select a dataset that already has User details augmented.

ApexDataset.label: Choose an existing Apex Executions dataset.
ApexDataset.description: This should be the original ApexExecution event log file, provided by the Event Monitoring templated app, or one created from an external connector. Please do not select a dataset that already has User details augmented.

ExceptionsDataset.label: Choose an existing Apex Exceptions dataset.
ExceptionsDataset.description: This should be the original ApexUnexpectedException event log file, provided by the Event Monitoring templated app, or one created from an external connector. Please do not select a dataset that already has User details augmented.

VFDataset.label: Choose an existing Visualforce Requests dataset.
VFDataset.description: This should be the original VisualforceRequest event log file, provided by the Event Monitoring templated app, or one created from an external connector. Please do not select a dataset that already has User details augmented.
